meanings.definition: A large predatory fish with sharp teeth and a streamlined body.
meanings.sent1: The shark swam swiftly through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a shark at the aquarium today.
meanings.sent3: The shark challenged the other fish to a race.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sharp as a shark's tooth.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of the shark loomed beneath the surface.

meanings.definition: A person who is ruthless or aggressive in business or sports.
meanings.sent1: The business shark made a bold move in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He was known as a shark in the world of finance.
meanings.sent3: The soccer shark scored another goal for his team.
meanings.sent4: She attacked the project with the precision of a shark.
meanings.sent5: The poker shark bluffed his way to victory.
